scripts.dev: concurrently -n WEB,API -c blue,green "pnpm run dev:web" "pnpm run dev:api"
scripts.db:migrate: pnpm exec dotenv -e .env -- pnpm dlx prisma migrate dev --schema apps/api/prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.db:studio: pnpm exec dotenv -e .env -- pnpm dlx prisma studio --schema apps/api/prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.db:generate: pnpm exec dotenv -e .env -- pnpm dlx prisma generate --schema apps/api/prisma/schema.prisma
